name: Candle Coffee Courier
description:
Coffee is the life-blood for so many of us. Possibly an Unstable Volcano as well?

Presented by Rogapol.  Join the community discord to keep up to date on our new releases and updates!

(Runs fine in Web, download if you want Full-screen)

Controls:
  • Move: WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Joystick
  • Jump: Space / Gamepad-South
  • Pause: Escape / Start 
    • Adjust Music / SFX Volume from the Pause Menu
  • Full-Screen: F4 (Desktop EXE only)
Music:

Music by Mark Sparling; featuring the song "Daily October 31 2019 #1202 (Chipsounds + Piano) | Mark Sparling"

Developed By:
  • BurritoEclair - Art
  • Boykala - Camera, Lighting, Art Implementation, Hazard Programming
  • BluishGreenPro - Level Design, Character Controller, Menus
